item.title: A first app
item.author: Author
item.description: In this section we will create an empty GitHub repository, clone it, and create an extremely basic Streamlit app that we will be able to view in a web browser. The app will not do much at all, but once we have completed this checkpoint we will be set up with everything we need for the rest of the workshop. Set up a repository to work with Create a Github repository Create a new repository on GitHub.

item.title: Prerequisites
item.author: Author
item.description: There are a small number of tools you need in order to create and deploy Streamlit apps. Software Python Streamlit is a Python package, and requires Python 3.6+. To verify you have an appropriate version of Python, run: python --version from a command line. If you see a Python 2 version then try python3 --version instead. Tip If you are installing Python on Windows, make sure you tick the “add to path” option when presented.
